select review_num, title, content, review_date, readcount, edit_date, L_NUM, K_NAME, mem_num, mem_nickname, picture_url, next, prev from ( select r.review_num, r.title, r.content, r.review_date, r.readcount, r.edit_date, l.L_NUM, l.K_NAME, m.mem_num, m.mem_nickname, m.picture_url, lag(review_num, 1, -1) over(order by review_num asc) as prev, lead(review_num, 1, -1) over(order by review_num asc) as next from review r join local l on r.L_NUM = l.L_NUM join member m on r.mem_num = m.mem_num) where review_num = #{reviewNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NUM, MEM_NUM, L_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (review_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{lnum},#{title} , #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET L_NUM = #{lnum}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} EDIT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_NUM = #{review_num}
mapper.sql: SELECT r.review_num, r.title, r.content, r.review_date, l.K_NAME, l.L_NUM, m.mem_num, m.mem_nickname, (SELECT AVG(rt.rating) FROM rating rt WHERE rt.review_num = r.review_num) AS ratingAvg
FROM review r JOIN local l ON r.L_NUM = l.L_NUM JOIN member m ON r.mem_num = m.mem_num

choose.when: ORDER BY ratingAvg DESC NULLS LAST , review_num DESC
